ai-patthana15.14:0.2_0: The Order of the Dhamma: allows unintelligent in the Khadehaka, and constantly preciously for him.
ai-patthana15.14:1.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana15.14:2.1_0: You shouldn’t give a teaching with no cause or reason.
ai-patthana15.14:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana15.14:3.1_0: for the sake of sublime teaching doesn’t give rise to the cause, for the sake of sublime criticism, because of those who don’t cause or reason.
ai-patthana15.14:3.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
